context: Can you recommend any books by Neal Stephenson?
Sure! Neal Stephenson wrote The System of the World. It is a Science Fiction. Do you like reading these types of books?
I like historical novels. Is The System of the World that genre?

Yes, The System of the World is also a Historical Novel. If you like Historical novels you may also want to check out The Valley of Horses or The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle. Do you want to hear more titles?
Is the Valley of Horses part of a series?
rec: The Clan of the Cave Bear
resp: Yes, you are correct. The Valley of Horses came out after The Clan of the Cave Bear.
